A3JGroups

Class JGSupervisorRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
      • A3JGroups.JGSupervisorRole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.jgroups.MembershipListener, org.jgroups.MessageListener, org.jgroups.Receiver

    public abstract class JGSupervisorRole
extends org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
implements java.lang.Runnable
    JGSupervisorRole must be extended in order to define a certain type of supervisor. You must define the behavior of each supervisor implementing the run function. Only one rule at a time can be active in a group. In each group there is only a supervisor that works with the followers. A group, for exist, must have an active supervisorRole in its members.
    Author:
    bett.marco88@gmail.com

      • sendMessageToFollower

        public boolean sendMessageToFollower(A3JGMessage mex,
                            java.util.List<org.jgroups.Address> dest)
        You have to use this function to send message to followers.
        Parameters:
        mex - The A3JGMessage sent to followers.
        dest - The list of followers who will receive the message.
        Returns:
        True if the message is sent, false otherwise.

      • sendMessageOverTime

        public int sendMessageOverTime(A3JGMessage mex,
                      java.util.List<org.jgroups.Address> dest,
                      int days,
                      int hours,
                      int minutes)
        You have to use this function to send message, that will be saved over time, to followers. If days, hours and minutes are equal to 0, the message is valid for infinite.
        Parameters:
        mex - The A3JGMessage sent to followers.
        dest - The list of followers who will receive the message.
        days - The number of days of validity.
        hours - The number of hours of validity.
        minutes - The number of minutes of validity.
        Returns:
        True if the message is sent, false otherwise.

        public boolean changeRoleInGroup(int config)

      • fitnessFunc

        public abstract int fitnessFunc()
        This function return the fitness value of the supervisor. This value is used for choose the best candidate for be the new supervisor during an election.
        Returns:
        The Integer value of fitness.
